DOC.brief_summary: DelAgua Health Development , Manna Energy Rwanda Ministry Health collaborate project finance carbon credit distribute household-based water filter high-efficiency cook stove approximately 600,000 household Rwanda . Prior full roll campaign , implementers conduct research connection distribution among 2000 household western Rwanda . The objective match cohort study ( Phase 1B ) investigate whether filter stove deliver October 2012 still perform use , determine whether associated reduction exposure pathogens drink water stove , assembly information health condition necessary design large scale health impact evaluation .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Project Distribute Water Filters Cook Stoves Western Rwanda -- Phase 1B
DOC.criteria: Households eligible participate study reside select village willing participate receiving complete detail regard study . Intervention household must function stove water filter order participate , though need regular use . We enroll household child 5 year age Ubudehe group 1 2 .
